parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission failure can cause the vehicle to surge forward unexpectedly, leading to loss of control and potential accidents, especially in heavy traffic.
symptoms: The vehicle surges forward
hesitates from a cold start
clunks into gear at low speeds
and almost cuts out when idling at stop lights.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission fluid can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to unexpected disengagement, engine roaring, and stalling, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The transmission fluid is completely burnt up
the transmission disengages
and the engine roars.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: CV Joint Failure (Right Rear CV Joint)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the CV joint can cause loss of control and accidents, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: A clicking noise from the rear right CV joint
grease and oil leakage from the right rear CV joint
and the right rear CV joint breaks.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden acceleration or loss of brake function can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially when the vehicle is traveling at high speeds or in heavy traffic.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates unexpectedly
the brakes fail to engage or hold
the vehicle continues to move despite applying the brakes
the gas pedal becomes unresponsive
the vehicle slows down or loses power suddenly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the throttle control can cause the vehicle to accelerate or decelerate unexpectedly, leading to loss of control, accidents, or near-misses.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates or decelerates unexpectedly
the gas pedal becomes unresponsive
the vehicle slows down or loses power suddenly
the vehicle hesitates or lags when accelerating.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of engine power can cause the vehicle to slow down or stall, increasing the risk of accidents, especially when driving at high speeds or in heavy traffic.
symptoms: The engine fails to respond to the accelerator pedal
the vehicle's speed is limited to a low speed (e.g.
20 mph)
the "Reduced Performance" and "Check Engine" lights illuminate on the dashboard
the vehicle may stall or hesitate when accelerating.
